ScriptTemplate.MasterAddUpdate:
Declare @Overwrite Bit Select @Overwrite=1 IF ?PrimaryKeyParam=-1 BEGIN exec ?Database.System.spGetMasterID '?Schema.?TableName', @ID=?PrimaryKeyParam output IF @@Error <> 0 return
Set @LastUpdated = convert(datetime,convert(varchar,getdate(),120))
INSERT INTO ?Database.?Schema.?TableName(?FieldList) VALUES(?ParamList) END ELSE BEGIN IF @Overwrite=0 BEGIN IF @LastUpdated <> (Select fldLastUpdated from ?Database.?Schema.?TableName where ?PrimaryKeyField = ?PrimaryKeyParam) RAISERROR(50001,16,1) END
Set @LastUpdated = convert(datetime,convert(varchar,getdate(),120))
UPDATE ?Database.?Schema.?TableName SET ?UpdateFieldParamList where ?PrimaryKeyField=?PrimaryKeyParam END
ScriptTemplate.DocControlAddUpdate:
Declare @Overwrite Bit, @ErrMsg Varchar(500), @Month Varchar(3), @V_ID bigint Select @Overwrite=1, @ErrMsg = '', @Month='', @V_ID=-1
If ?PrimaryKeyParam = '' Begin -- **** Fetch Sequence Update ?Database.?Schema.?SequenceTable Set fldBit=1 Where fldYear=@Year and @Date>=fldDateFrom and @Date<=fldDateTo and fldType=@Type and fldBranch_ID=@Branch_ID
Select @V_ID=fldMaxVoucherNo + 1, @Month=fldMonth From ?Database.?Schema.?SequenceTable Where fldYear=@Year and @Date>=fldDateFrom and @Date<=fldDateTo and fldType=@Type and fldBranch_ID=@Branch_ID
If @V_ID = -1 Begin Select @ErrMsg = 'Sequence entry for ' + @Type + ' not found in ?Schema.?SequenceTable for document dated ' + Convert(Varchar(50), @Date); Raiserror(@ErrMsg, 16, 1); Return; End
Update ?Database.?Schema.?SequenceTable Set fldMaxVoucherNo = @V_ID, fldBit=0 Where fldYear=@Year and @Date>=fldDateFrom and @Date<=fldDateTo and fldType=@Type and fldBranch_ID=@Branch_ID
-- **** Create Voucher_ID Exec ?Database.System.spCreateDocID @Type, @Branch_ID, @Year, @Month, @V_ID, @Doc_ID=?PrimaryKeyParam Output Set @LastUpdated = convert(Datetime,convert(Varchar,getdate(),120))
Insert Into ?Database.?Schema.?TableName (?FieldList) Values (?ParamList) End Else Begin
Declare @StatusChanged Bit Exec ?Database.System.spVerifyStatus ?PrimaryKeyParam, '?PrimaryKeyField', '?Schema.?TableName', @Status, @StatusChanged=@StatusChanged Output If @StatusChanged = 1 Begin Select @ErrMsg = 'Document Status Changed for Document No. ' + ?PrimaryKeyParam + '.'; Raiserror(@ErrMsg, 16,1); Return; End
If @Overwrite=0 Begin Declare @Modified Bit Exec ?Database.System.spVerifyIsCurrent ?PrimaryKeyParam, '?PrimaryKeyField', '?Schema.?TableName', @LastUpdated, @Modified=@Modified Output If @Modified = 1 Begin Raiserror(50001, 16,1) Return End End Set @LastUpdated = convert(Datetime,convert(Varchar,getdate(),120))
Update ?Database.?Schema.?TableName Set ?UpdateFieldParamList Where ?PrimaryKeyField = ?PrimaryKeyParam End
